description: Muscle-man Dereck Fox and athletic model Luca Rosso are competing head-to-head as they try to score a contract for an important underwear campaign. Although both candidates are eager to represent this hot new line of underwear, there may only be a spot for one of them. With everything on the line, they set out to show what a perfect pairing they would make by stuffing their fat cocks in each other’s desperate holes.
title: Underwear Campaign
